# public-cybersec
cybersec grad journey

## About
Tracking my daily coding and learning in cybersecurity. Goals: Build skills in encryption, networking, and ethical hacking.

## Week 1 (Nov 24 - Nov 29, 2025)
- Day 1: Learned password hashing with Python. See Week-1/day1-password-hasher.py.
- Day 2: Explored basic network scanning. Challenges: Understanding ports.
- Progress: Completed intro to cryptography module. Next: Web vulnerabilities.
